name: Poltergeist Breakup
description: Your ex ghosted you, and now you're a ghost! Your mission is to ruin your ex's new date. As a poltergeist, you have the ability to possess household items. Make sure to time it correctly or you will run out of things to possess faster than the span of the date. If the date gets a little too hot, knock some sense into your ex to lower the love meter.
